sentences.en: ...a 50-minute manifesto with citations from the Koran.
sentences.cn: …一段长达50分钟、带有《古兰经》引文的宣言。

sentences.en: Citation form is described at the bottom of this page.
sentences.cn: 引用资料的格式会在本页下方说明.

sentences.en: Each award carries a formal citation and offers public recognition.
sentences.cn: 南洋校友奖将于校友回校日颁发.

sentences.en: Has your club received the Presidential Citation in the past?
sentences.cn: 你的社曾经得过社长奖 吗 ?

sentences.en: He had to sign the proposition for the citation.
sentences.cn: 他只好在受奖申请书上签了字.

sentences.en: His citation says he showed outstanding and exemplary courage.
sentences.cn: 颁给他的嘉奖令称他表现出非凡的勇气，堪为表率。

sentences.en: I know of you from the ISI paper citation system.
sentences.cn: 我是从ISI科学论文引证系统知道您.

sentences.en: Lao Yu's citation has ignited the infinite spite of his favorite's appetite.
sentences.cn: 老俞的引用点燃了他宠物胃口的无限怨恨.

sentences.en: SCI - Science Citation Index, ISTP - Index to Scientific and Technical Proceedings , EI - Engineering Index.
sentences.cn: 三系统指“科学引文索引” 、 “科学技术会议录索引”和“工程索引”.

sentences.en: Some methods of the citation of class situation are introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了课堂情境创设的一些方法.

sentences.en: The court could issue a citation and fine Ms. Robbins.
sentences.cn: 法庭可能会发传票，对罗宾斯女士处以罚款。

sentences.en: The essay begins with a citation from ‘Hamlet’.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章开头引用了《哈姆雷特》中的一句话。

sentences.en: The pape proposes a project of citation analysis system of post - graduate dissertations.
sentences.cn: 本文提出了研究生学位论文引文分析系统的设计方案.

sentences.en: This examples uses the CITE element to render a citation in italic.
sentences.cn: 下面的例子使用了CITE元素将引文以斜体显示.

sentences.en: What kind of citation you are going to get?
sentences.cn: 你会得到哪一种表扬 呢 ?

sentences.en: You must acknowledge the author using the correct citation and reference.
sentences.cn: 你必须用正确的引用和参考方式注明原作者.

trans.tran_cn: 引用，引述，嘉奖，〈法律〉传唤
trans.tran_en: a line taken from a book, speech etc
